Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Heyggram
Reviews.Content: Recibi mi telefono hace dias pues todo bien esta nuevo todo lo que dice en la descripcion entrega excelente y me funciona muy bien, del telefono no me quejo me llego con todos sun accesorios sin ningun detalle negativo

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone!
Reviews.Author: VIOMAR MARCANO
Reviews.Content: This Blackberry is an excellent choice for anyone. Just keep in mind that if you want to be able to have 3G coverage check out the frecuency band of your network (Important for People in Latin America).Consider this: Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and 2100/1900/1700/850/8000 MHz 3G frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities 3G networks not available everywhere

Reviews.Title: The off button does not work well
Reviews.Author: kk
Reviews.Content: The off button does not work well, it always sunk and I have to make it out, it's hardly to believe a new phone shall operate like this. since I am far from the states, I can't change. but I have to say the truth. I am a bit sad to this owner and amazon.

Reviews.Title: I WAS TOTALLY CHEATED WITH THIS PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: Rogelio E. Sanchez V "Sancrog"
Reviews.Content: I am so sorry about this happens to Amazon.com. I really like purchasing here and I use to trust about the products with the Primer Membership... But guess what, I thought I bought a brand new "BlackBerry 9780 Bold Unlocked Phone, 5MP Camera" It suppose to be a brand new phone... What I got? Just a really ugly blackberry 9780 box with a phone and its accessories inside... Guess what, Box IMEI and PIN number doesn't match phone's, something worse, even the whole phone is another version, I bought a Blackberry 9780 and I got a 9700 in a 9780 box... 9700 come with a 3.2MP camera!!! but it gets worse, phone looks refurbished or something, I mean, it doesn't looks like a new phone... But there is something else, all the accessories looks pretty cheat, the phone case is the cheapest quality I've ever seen...I was totally cheated by this merchant...

Reviews.Title: Bad battery and service
Reviews.Author: Ursula El Hage
Reviews.Content: The battery of the cellphone dies when it gets to half of it, i had to buy another one.The cell is supposed to work on 3G but it only work 2G. Even though I have the 3G service

Reviews.Title: El equipo no funciona
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: Al teléfono se le coloco la linea ( Movilnet) y funcionó durante dos días luego presento problemas e inmediatamente dejo de funcionar. se llevo a la agencia de Movilnet y dijeron que tenia que revisarlo el técnico. Después de la revisión, el mismo dijo que era  defecto del equipo que no tenia solución.Como el equipo tiene garantía, necesito me digan que debo hacer para resolver este problema.Saludos,Roberto Cravero

Reviews.Title: BLACKBERRY 9780
Reviews.Author: FRANKLIN
Reviews.Content: GOOD DAYS, THE PRODUCT FOR THAT RECEIPT THIS ONE IN MINT CONDITION AS IT WAS WAITING, I AM SATISFIED BY THE PURCHASE IT HAS THE BANDS OPENED FOR ALL THE OPERATORS ONLY ONE IS THAT IT DOES NOT RAISE 3G WITH THE OPERATOR MOVISTAR IN VENEZUELA

Reviews.Title: ask for Phone
Reviews.Author: b3to48
Reviews.Content: good night, the phone that you have published is t-mobile? because here in Venezuela t-mobile does not work on 3G

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Neudis Cana
Reviews.Content: Muy buen equipo, la camara es excelente, y es mas rapido que el bold 2, recomiendo este esquipo a todos los clientes de amazon.com

Reviews.Title: celular 9780 y 9800
Reviews.Author: LIB 30369 maria del carmen volcan oliveros
Reviews.Content: recibi el celular 9780 en perfectas condiciones con todo como lo describen,  el celular  9800 de verdad no me sirvio llego con la tarjeta dañada y no tiene reparacion fue una gran decepcion ya que como recuperar o por lo menos poderlo reparar

Reviews.Title: Incorformidad to Article
Reviews.Author: alexander antonio balza rivero
Reviews.Content: This article is not served because it leaves me reported stolen or stolen in the country of origin, therefore the dollars lost Cart

Reviews.Title: Be true to the phones condition
Reviews.Author: Christopher Wong
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 phones  1 was in excellent condition.. The other was very bad. In the future it would be nice to know the true  condition of both phones. And not be lead to believe there both in great condition.

Reviews.Title: ok phone
Reviews.Author: Dingo "Dingo"
Reviews.Content: what can I say? the phone works ok and was the right price and seller shipped super fast. Im not a BB fan but phone is ok besides the normal battery issues

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Alex Falcon
Reviews.Content: I recomend this buyer it is quick and responsable and the thing a bought it is as expected buy a recomend them

Reviews.Title: information about the phone
Reviews.Author: omar jose pirela sangronis
Reviews.Content: the phone was selected in buying a new one, the phone received this rebuilt not bring all the accessories and I miss the headphones and the battery is not original

Reviews.Title: reclamo
Reviews.Author: alberto braz
Reviews.Content: hola veo con preocupacion que que los celulares llegan sin audifono o auricularhello I note with concern that the phones come without headset or handset

Reviews.Title: Gracias
Reviews.Author: cristhw
Reviews.Content: Muchas gracias, compre desde Vevezuela con una Gif Card sin ningun contratiempo con el pago, me llego la mercancia acordada, gracias.

Reviews.Title: Very good cell phone.
Reviews.Author: Cedeno Johanna "Leonardo Villarroel"
Reviews.Content: Phone The Blackberry Bold 9780 is a very complete and useful phone for both office work and for the use of many useful tools for different types of needs!

Reviews.Title: Regret
Reviews.Author: Bev G
Reviews.Content: I hate this so much; within a week the screen started to give me a black discolouration at the top left hand corner.  The camera gives me a grainy looking picture and no matter how much I adjust the setting it never changed.  I contacted the seller about the screen and did not get a redress - please stay away from this seller; the phone is fine other wise.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: alessa
Reviews.Content: this product is interesting and good product. good factory. this product help for complete anything. is important have this product

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: dave_7799
Reviews.Content: received in good conditionwould reccomend to any person wanting to purchase a small phone thats does the work of a big phone

Reviews.Title: Bold 9780
Reviews.Author: endy mathias
Reviews.Content: I received it without the accessories but phone is in good condition. I am yet to commence using it since it is not yet unlocked.The phone came as described before the purchase.

Reviews.Title: phone conditions
Reviews.Author: Gerson Acosta "gerson"
Reviews.Content: good evening I need to know if conditions are phone is new package without any problem and vene unlocked, for use in Venezuela, I wonder why and had experience and bought phone there and I get used, I want to know if the phone is completely unused thanks again

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 9780
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: El teléfono funciona perfectamente en Venezuela, esta desbloqueado para todas las operadoras, sin embargo, la apariencia del producto me deja dudas, si es enteramente nuevo, además no funciona o mejor dicho no lee las tarjetas de memoria micro sd, lo mande a revisar con un especialista y me indica que las pistas están dañadas, realmente no quede satisfecho con el producto.

Reviews.Title: excelente telefono
Reviews.Author: lawrence
Reviews.Content: excelente producto recomendado deacuerdo al fabricante, rapido seguro y oportuno vendedor, oferta y disponibilidada garantizada, tiempo de entrega acordado al destino solicitado.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Carlos Daniel
Reviews.Content: Excelente equipo con todos los accesorios en perfecto estado no he tenido ningún problema y trabaja correctamente ... Saludos desde ecuador :-)

Reviews.Title: Bold 9780
Reviews.Author: noiralih la torre
Reviews.Content: Teléfono llego en buen estado, se actualizo el software y esta funcionando muy bien con la operadora de movilnet, es rápido para navegar, siempre y cuando la operadora este en sus máximo rendimiento

Reviews.Title: No tan buen producto
Reviews.Author: melissa carrasquero
Reviews.Content: coloco 3 estrellas por dos cosas, una es que el cargador vino dañado y lo otro es q la configuración del celular es en ingles, cosa que deberían aclararlo.

Reviews.Title: haven't recieved my money back cause of a wrong item
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Murillo
Reviews.Content: haven't recieved my money back cause of a wrong item. I returned the wrong item, but havent had any notice about my money it was 3 month ago

Reviews.Title: Works!!
Reviews.Author: Gerardo A. Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: Funciona con 3G de Movistar en Venezuela, lo demas? Tal cual la descripcion del articulo. Ya ustedes saben el resto de RIM.

Reviews.Title: codigo mep
Reviews.Author: Enrique rigaud
Reviews.Content: buenas noches compre un blakcberry y al llegar a venezuela me pide el codigo mep por desconocimiento lo bloquie y ahora dice cero intentos de codigo mep en que me puede ayudar no he usado el equipo

Reviews.Title: exellent but not incluistes leather lining (forro de cuero)
Reviews.Author: John Romero/williams
Reviews.Content: excellent, but not incluistes leather lining and the phone according to your specifications and include it with the agreement failed to meet prodProduct (Product Image  BlackBerry 9780 Bold Unlocked Phone with QWERTY Keyboard, 5MP Camera, Wi-Fi and GPS - No Warranty - Black)

Reviews.Title: esperando
Reviews.Author: Inherca "inversiones herpave"
Reviews.Content: lo compre para llevarlo a venezuela, en cuanto le coloque la linea telefonica podre opinar con mas detalles sin embargo con referencia a la entrega fue satisfactoria

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: PpO0205
Reviews.Content: Is a very nice smartphone.Everybody love this 9700 even better than nre smartphone of Blackberry.Totally recommended for you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: alexis
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, I like a lot, like how to purchase is very simple and convenient, as well as the payment without much protocol and intermediary.

Reviews.Title: una estafa
Reviews.Author: lenin quimis
Reviews.Content: el celular llego bien pero no puede conectarse a 3g en Ecuador... solo a EDGE o 2g tengan cuidadoesa imfromacion no viene detalladasolo dice desbloqueado

Reviews.Title: Nunca llego!!!
Reviews.Author: Jose Gabriel
Reviews.Content: Segun el tracking el product fue dejado en la Puerta de la casa, no fue entregado a ninguna persona! Simplemente lo dejaron. Cuando fui a verificar, no habit nada. Segue UPS dejaron el 11 de octubre, estamos 14 y no tengo mi celular!!

Reviews.Content: I came to the article, never. I stole, cheated, and it gets sent him and all involucradosdel another matter ... or is there nothing more to say ... that this

Reviews.Title: Nunca recibi el equipo, por lo tanto no tengo ni idea si es bueno o malo, sera en otra ocación que pueda dar mi opinión
Reviews.Author: Natacha
Reviews.Content: No pude saber como era el equipo ya que no me llego. Lleno las estrellitas porque se por otras personas que el equipo funciona bastante bien.
